definition: Sir Li Ka-shing (1928-), Hong Kong businessman
plum
surname Li
surname Jia
excellent/auspicious/to praise/to commend
sincere/authentic/really/truly

sentences.english: Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd., controlled by billionaire Li Ka-shing, also took part.
sentences.chinese: 亿万富翁李嘉诚控制的长江基建也参与了其中。

sentences.english: That would be Li Ka-shing, whose fortune jumped 30 percent to $21 billion over the last year.
sentences.chinese: 就是在去年财富增加30%至210亿美元的李嘉诚。

sentences.english: Hong Kong billionaire Li Ka-shing's foundation is a major supporter of the Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business.
sentences.chinese: 香港亿万富豪李嘉诚基金是长江商学院的主要资助者。

sentences.english: Sponsored by Li Ka Shing Foundation and the Shantou University.
sentences.chinese: 是次讲座由李嘉诚基金及汕头大学赞助。
